00056 class PQXX_LIBEXPORT dbtransaction : public transaction_base
00057 {
00058 protected:
00059   explicit dbtransaction(connection_base &C,
00060                          const PGSTD::string &IsolationString,
00061                          const PGSTD::string &NName) :                  //[]
00062     transaction_base(C, NName),
00063     m_StartCmd("START TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL " + IsolationString)
00064   {}
00065 
00067   const PGSTD::string &StartCmd() const { return m_StartCmd; }
00068 
00069 private:
00071   virtual void DoBegin() =0;
00073   virtual result DoExec(const char Query[]) =0;
00075   virtual void DoCommit() =0;
00077   virtual void DoAbort() =0;
00078
